topic.title: Website Headers, Footers, Lists and Navigation Bar
topic.section:
Conference Homepage Header:
Any image or logo uploaded here, or any title text written here will appear on the hosted conference homepage only.

Website Header:
Any information added here will appear on all hosted conference non-homepage pages. An alternate header, including HTML code, can be added here.

Website Footer:
Any information added here will appear on every hosted conference page. HTML can be added to the conference footer.

Navigation Bar:
Additional navigation bar items can be added; these will appear in the form of a link on the navigation bar, and can point to either an internal page or an external one.

Lists:
A lot of information in OCS is presented in list form. The number of items and number of page links that appear in such lists can be specified here.
